headline: Carvana (CVNA) Is Up 15.7% After S&P 500 Inclusion And Rising Institutional Sponsorship
summary: In recent weeks Carvana has attracted renewed attention as analysts at major banks, a large asset manager, and index providers have all highlighted its operational progress, S&P 500 inclusion, and accelerating used-vehicle sales momentum. A particularly interesting development is growing institutional sponsorship, with firms like Vanguard disclosing a sizeable stake while others publicly reassess position sizes based on opportunity cost rather than company-specific concerns.
